name: financial_freedom
description: Comprehensive pathways to financial independence and lifestyle design
command: mirador chain creative_entrepreneur task_planner "Design a 5-year plan for achieving financial freedom starting from [CURRENT SITUATION]"
notes: This chain creates holistic financial independence plans that integrate income strategies, spending optimization, investment approaches, and lifestyle considerations. The creative_entrepreneur generates the strategic vision while the task_planner creates actionable implementation steps.
